bibl.title: Preliminary Notes on the Arabic Material in the Petra Papyri.
bibl.note: Communication présentée au colloque "Les Arabes dans l'Antiquité" (Lyon, 6-7 janvier 2005). - Concentrates on P. Petra Inv. 10, a division of property (ca. 520-540 AD) containing about 60 Arabic words in Greek letters: The Material; - The Phonetics; - Morphology; - Syntax; - Vocabulary; - Orthography; - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: AL-GHUL Omar, Preliminary Notes on the Arabic Material in the Petra Papyri.

Communication présentée au colloque "Les Arabes dans l'Antiquité" (Lyon, 6-7 janvier 2005). - Concentrates on P. Petra Inv. 10, a division of property (ca. 520-540 AD) containing about 60 Arabic words in Greek letters: The Material; - The Phonetics; - Morphology; - Syntax; - Vocabulary; - Orthography; - Conclusions.
